chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_1 p0 (pl_essence p0 p1) p1 = pl_produit_1 p0 n p1

Premises:
pl_essence = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_card pl0 + pl_card pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> nat
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pl_produit_1 = fix pl_produit_0 (a : ad) (la pl : prec_list) (n : nat) (l : prec_list) {struct n} : prec_list := match n with | 0 => prec_empty | S m => match pl with | prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 => prec_cons (iad_conv a a0) (pl_produit_1 la m la0) (pl_produit_0 a la ls0 m l) | prec_empty => l end end with pl_produit_1 (pl0 : prec_list) (n : nat) (pl1 : prec_list) {struct n} : prec_list := match n with | 0 => prec_empty | S m => match pl0 with | prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 => match pl1 with | prec_cons a1 la1 ls1 => pl_produit_0 a0 la0 (prec_cons a1 la1 ls1) m (pl_produit_1 ls0 m (prec_cons a1 la1 ls1)) | prec_empty
pl_product_0 : forall p0 p1 : prec_list, (forall (a : ad) (l : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 (pl_essence p0 p1) l = pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 n l) /\ (forall n : nat, pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_1 p0 (pl_essence p0 p1) p1 = pl_produit_1 p0 n p1)
pl_produit_1_incr = fun p0 p1 : prec_list => forall n : nat, pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_1 p0 (pl_essence p0 p1) p1 = pl_produit_1 p0 n p1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_0_incr = fun p0 p1 : prec_list => forall (a : ad) (l : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_essence p0 p1 <= n -> pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 (pl_essence p0 p1) l = pl_produit_0 a p0 p1 n l : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_pl_compat : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p0 n -> pl_tl_length p1 n -> pl_compat p0 p1
pl_compatible_compat : forall p0 p1 : prec_list, pl_compatible p0 p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1
prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_contained_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_contained p1 p2
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_contained_0 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_contained p0 p2
prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
prec_occur_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_occur p2 a
st_compatible_compat_0 = fun (s1 : state) (_ : st_compatible (M0 prec_list) s1) (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list) (H0 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some p0) (_ : MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1) => let H2 : Some p0 = Some p0 -> pl_compat p0 p1 := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some p0 -> pl_compat p0 p1) with | eq_refl => fun H2 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some p0 => (fun H3 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some p0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c) (fun e : option prec_list => match e with | Some _ => False | None => True end) I (Some p0) H3 in False_ind (pl_compat p0 p1) H4) H2 end in H2 eq_refl...
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_3 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def p p0 t
liste_rec_length_3 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> liste_rec_length_def p p0 t
pl_tl_length_rec_4 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 p p0 t
pl_path_incl_length_3 : forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> pl_path_incl_length_def p p0
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_3 : forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def p p0
pl_produit = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_produit_1 pl0 (pl_essence pl0 pl1) pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
aux_Neqb_1_1 : forall p p0 : positive, (p =? p0)%positive = true -> p = p0
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
pl_compat_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> pl_compat_check p = Some n
pl_compat_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_compat_check p = Some n -> pl_tl_length p n
pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
liste_rec_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA) (n : nat), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
invar_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
forall_incl_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), (forall p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl -> pl_path_length p = n) -> pl_tl_length pl n
pl_ess_invar_3 : forall (a' : ad) (la la' ls' : prec_list), S (pl_essence la la') <= pl_essence la (prec_cons a' la' ls')
pl_ess_invar_4 : forall (a' : ad) (la la' ls' : prec_list), S (pl_essence la ls') <= pl_essence la (prec_cons a' la' ls')
